Text: and does it have any subs??

Sorry I forgot about subs... It' looks like the is no any subs on this DVD. There are 5 sound tracks
eng DD5.1, eng. DTS-ES, french DD5.1, french DD2.0. Subs for this movie are easily available elsewhere, but I did not any 'reverse engineering' 
with DVD so I did not put subs either.
Any more seeders out there for this great edition of a classic?  Help, please!!!...thanks!
In the case when it is one seeder only, I will seed also.
In the case someone will urgently need to download this ISO, please leave message as a comment. I am not able to keep this on HDs all time.

Indeed this movie deserves being revived! Darkman and this one are my Raimi's favorites. Pitty about the subtitles tough, but this isn't really a dialogue movie more a visual and fantastic entertainment one. Than you very much for this great classic Z. Cheers
